bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of conglomerations formed as a result of a frightening event or other mental harm experienced during menstruation. It is often associated with mental problems. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 34: 狐瘕者，婦人月水當日數來，而反悲哀自恐，若以遠 行，逢暴風疾雨，電雷驚恐 , “As for ‘ fox conglomeration-illness ’, [its causes are as follows]: When a woman’s period arrives on time in large quantities, and if still she is plagued by sorrow or spontaneous fear, or if she travels a long way and encounters violent wind and torrential rain, and is terrified by lightning and thunder”.
